original_title: Fair Warning: The Call of the East Live In Japan 1993
overview: Filmed at Club Citta in Kawasaki, on April 18th 1993, during one of their many successful tours of Japan, this DVD captures the ultimate live experience by one of Hard Rock's most enduring outfits. 14 rockin' gems including "Crazy', 'The Eyes Of Rock', 'Out On The Run', 'When Love Fails' and more.
title: Fair Warning: The Call of the East Live In Japan 1993
